name: Advanced Mill
description:
Advanced Mill is an iOS adaptation of the traditional board game Mill. The game also known as Merils and Nine Men's Morris.

Features:
Play against CPU - Advanced AI with three difficulty levels.
Two player game on the same device.
Two player network game with Game Center.
Getting CPU hint.
No ads.
Undo function to take back moves.
Displaying elapsed time, number of turns, reason of win at the end of the game.
Checking and handling tie situations.
Optional hints for beginner players.
Displaying available moves.
Saving and loading games from Main Menu.
Autosaving game state - never lose a game on a call.
